content: 9 10 sts from the heel 86 94 101 sts total 30 33 36 sts now on new needle 1 and needle 3 26 28 29 sts on needle 2 round 1 needle 1 k to 3 sts from end of needle k2tog k1 needle 2 work across all sts continuing in pattern as established for leg needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle round 2 needle 1 k all sts needle 2 work aross all sts continuing in repeat these last two rounds until a total and the top of the foot pattern as established of 16 20 24 sts remain sts on needles 2 and 3 will be used for the needle 3 k all sts back of the leg and later for the heel sts size l only on final repeat of round 1 repeat these last two rounds until skip ssk on needle 2 decreasing a total of join for working in the round being needles 1 and 3 hold 13 14 16 sts each 3 sts on this final round instead of 4 careful not to twist 52 56 61 sts remain in total graft remaining sts closed using kitchener round 1 p1 k1 2 times p2 k4 p2 k1 foot stitch alternately bind off all sts and then p1 to end of round continue even in pattern as set until graft toe closed rounds 2-10 repeat round 1 foot measures 1 5 1 75 2 ins less than desired total length of foot leg pattern left sock round 1 p1 k1 6 8 10 times p2 c4r toe the left sock is identical to the right sock p2 k3 p1 to end of round ending k3 round 1 with the exception that the cable is placed rounds 2-8 p1 k1 2 times p2 k4 p2 needle 1 k to 3 sts from end of needle on the left side of the foot instead of the k1 p1 to end of round k2tog k1 right side needle 2 k1 ssk k to 3sts from end of repeat leg pattern rounds 1-8 until sock needle k2tog k1 cast on 51 55 59 sts measures 5 6 6 ins from beg or desired needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle 4 divide across 3 double-pointed needles in length before starting heel sts decreased across round 1 this manner needle 1 24 28 32 sts continuing in pattern as set complete round 2 needle 2 14 14 14 sts the heel gussets foot and toe in same k all sts needle 3 13 13 13 sts manner as for right sock sts on needle 1 form the front of the leg glenna c designs copyright 2009-2016 | email crazy knitting lady@gmail com | web http //glennaknits com pattern instructions are for personal use only
